info.name: NTU Dark
info.description:
A dark theme for Nanyang Technological University's website.
Let me know if there are any bugs! Find me @YeeJiasheng (FB, IG, Twitter, LinkedIn)
info.additionalInfo:
v1.04 - Added an exception for maps.ntu.edu.sg
v1.03 - Added Blackboard, updated support for new version of NTU's site (it looks different now vs. in my screenshot)
v1.02 - Removed Blackboard from List of Applicable Websites
v1.01 - Blackboard Update
v1.0 - Release
